page.title: 19Shopping in Longwell Green.
page.content: Most people shop at Asda,a{Super Store that has been open for two and a half years.It is owned by Associated Dairies. Approximately 60% of 150 people shop there while 30% shop locally. The{most popular shopping days}are Thursday and Friday. 52% shop once a week while 24% shop every day. 66% of the shoppers used their car to go shopping while the remainder walked.About 70% of the people said that the opening of Asda had changed their shopping habits. For about 70% of shoppers the local shops were less than 500m distance away while Asda would be over 1km. When asked what improvements people would like, the two major suggestions were for a greater variety of shops and a bank.
